title: The Return of the god of gamblers [Dubbed]
creator_credit: Wong Jing, Jimmy Heung, Golden Harvest and Win's Movie Production
brief_description: Ko Chun, the God of Gamblers, returns living a wealthy life but a rival appears, killing his pregnant wife and soon to be son. Before dying, his wife tells him not to gamble for one year and not to reveal his identity as the God of Gamblers. A year almost passes, and the gambler lives a forgiving life, until the man who kills his wife appears, taking revenge into his own hands. Cast includes Chow Yun-Fat, Tony Leung. Dubbed in English.
